content:
A classic! I've added it to your list:

1. Avengers: Endgame (2019)
2. Joker (2019)
3. Stranger Things (Season 3) (2019)
4. Toy Story 4 (2019)
5. Spider-Man: Far From Home (2019)
6. Captain Marvel (2019)
7. When They See Us (Miniseries) (2019)
8. The Princess Bride (1987)

It's great that you got to enjoy a beloved film in a unique setting with your colleagues! Outdoor movie screenings can be such a fun experience.

Let me know if there's anything else you'd like to add to your list. I'm all ears!
